attributes.action: give wales independance from the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: dear welsh people i have had many a conversation and i have decided to create the petition to dissolve wales from the Uk as we are not associated with the flag and fed up of welsh sporting talent being classed as british we need aour own identity on the world stage lets stand up for ourselves

rejection.details: There is a similar peition: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Ind-Wales/ You may want to sign this before opening a new one.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
